{"id":868507667,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1672481681,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/868507667/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<vector<int>> res;\n\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.size() - 1; i++) {\n            int target = 0 - nums[i];\n            unordered_map<int,int> mp;\n            \n            for(int j = i+1; j<nums.size(); j++) {\n                if(mp.find(target - nums[j]) != mp.end()) {\n                    vector<int> ans;\n                    ans.push_back(nums[i]);\n                    ans.push_back(nums[j]);\n                    ans.push_back(nums[mp[target - nums[j]]]);\n                    sort(ans.begin(), ans.end());\n                    auto it = find(res.begin(), res.end(), ans);\n                    if(it == res.end()) res.push_back(ans);\n                }\n\n                mp[nums[j]] = j;\n            }\n        }\n\n        sort(res.begin(), res.end());\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false}
